summary: Verified bug fix: Dashboard now correctly shows active quests using /child/quests-new endpoint. Previously showed 'No active quests' but now displays 2 active quests (PDF Testing, Updated Quest Title) matching the Quests page.
passed_tests: ✅ TEST 1: Dashboard loads successfully with session authentication
✅ TEST 2: Active Quests section found on Dashboard
✅ TEST 3: 'No active quests' message NOT showing (bug fixed!)
✅ TEST 4: Dashboard shows 2 active quests (PDF Testing, Updated Quest Title)
✅ TEST 5: Quest cards display title, description, and reward amount (+₹10)
✅ TEST 6: Quests on Dashboard match those on Quests page
✅ TEST 7: Completed quest (Needs - COMPLETED) is filtered out from Dashboard

verified_features.dashboard_quests_display: Dashboard now fetches from /child/quests-new and shows up to 2 active quests
verified_features.quest_filtering: Completed/approved quests are correctly filtered out (status !== 'approved', status !== 'completed', user_status !== 'completed', !is_completed, !has_earned)
verified_features.quest_card_content: Quest cards show title, description, and reward amount (+₹XX format)

critical_code_review_comments: Endpoint fix correctly implemented: Line 52 changed from /child/quests to /child/quests-new
Filtering logic at Lines 59-65 properly excludes completed/approved quests
Dashboard correctly caps display to 2 quests with .slice(0, 2)
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data - 5 active quests + 1 completed quest
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bug fix verified: Dashboard now uses /child/quests-new endpoint (Line 52) and correctly displays active quests. Test child has 5 active quests (PDF Testing, Updated Quest Title, Clean your room, BUy Groceries, Shopping For Parathas) and 1 completed quest (Needs). Dashboard shows first 2 active quests. Filtering logic at Lines 59-65 works correctly.
